function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","Impact":"Increased risk of illness and burnout among health workers.","Mitigation":"Provide adequate protective equipment, implement work-hour regulations, and offer mental health support.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health support, AI for automating administrative tasks.","People":"Health workers, essential workers.","Owner":"Health organizations, government health departments."},{"Description":"Disproportionate burden on women to combine paid work, unpaid domestic work, and home-schooling children.","Impact":"Increased mental and physical workload on women, leading to stress and burnout.","Mitigation":"Promote flexible work arrangements, provide support for child care and domestic work, and address gender inequality in the workplace.","Technologies":"Remote working tools, online educational resources, AI for household tasks.","People":"Women, families, single parents.","Owner":"Employers, government, education institutions."},{"Description":"Escalation of domestic violence during the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of harm to individuals and families, exacerbated by the closure of courts for non-urgent matters.","Mitigation":"Increase support services for domestic violence victims, provide safe accommodation, and facilitate remote court proceedings.","Technologies":"Telehealth for counseling services, GPS tracking for victims, secure virtual court platforms.","People":"Victims of domestic violence, families.","Owner":"Government, law enforcement, and non-profit organizations."},{"Description":"Alteration of parenting agreements causing increased family stress and strain on courts during the pandemic.","Impact":"Disruption of family arrangements and increased pressure on court systems.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines for parenting arrangements during a pandemic, increase court capacity for urgent family matters, and facilitate remote court proceedings.","Technologies":"Virtual mediation platforms, secure document exchange systems.","People":"Families, single parents.","Owner":"Government, family courts, legal professionals."},{"Description":"Increased managerial prerogative allowing changes to employees' duties and work arrangements.","Impact":"Potential long-term economic impact on women due to reduced work flexibility.","Mitigation":"Reinstate employee rights, promote work-life balance, and address gender bias in workplace policies.","Technologies":"HR management systems, automated scheduling tools, remote collaboration platforms.","People":"Employers, employees.","Owner":"Government, labor unions, and employers' organizations."}]}
